languages.text: "Правда? Вот так новость! Пусть Император защищает вас тыщу лет и еще столько же за такую славную новость!" {n}Юноша расцветает счастливой улыбкой.{/n} "Клянусь, первенца в вашу честь назову! Всех детей в вашу честь назову!"

"Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"
languages.original_text: "Правда? Вот так новость! Пусть Император защищает вас тыщу лет и еще столько же за такую славную новость!" {n}Юноша расцветает счастливой улыбкой.{/n} "Клянусь, первенца в вашу честь назову! Всех детей в вашу честь назову!"

traits.locale_text: "Really? That's wonderful! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! I'll name all my children after you!"

"Really? That's wonderful! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! I'll name all my children after you!"

"Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

"Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

"Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

"Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

languages.text: "Wirklich? Das ist ja wunderbar! Möge der Imperator Euch eintausend Jahre lang beschützen und dann noch eintausend weitere, weil Ihr mir eine so gute Nachricht überbracht habt!" {n}Er strahlt.{/n} "Ich benenne meinen Erstgeborenen nach Euch, ich schwöre es! Ach was, ich benenne alle meine Kinder nach Euch!"
languages.original_text: "Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich? Das ist ja wunderbar! Möge der Imperator Euch eintausend Jahre lang beschützen und dann noch eintausend weitere, weil Ihr mir eine so gute Nachricht überbracht habt!" {n}Er strahlt.{/n} "Ich benenne meinen Erstgeborenen nach Euch, ich schwöre es! Ach was, ich benenne alle meine Kinder nach Euch!"

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Mais c'est merveilleux ! Que l'Empereur vous protège pour mille années, et encore mille de plus pour cette excellente nouvelle ! » {n}Vous le voyez rayonner de joie.{/n} « Je donnerai votre nom à mon premier enfant, je vous le promets ! Et même à tous mes enfants ! »
languages.original_text: "Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Mais c'est merveilleux ! Que l'empereur vous protège pour mille années, et encore mille de plus pour cette excellente nouvelle ! » {n}Vous le voyez rayonner de joie.{/n} « Je donnerai votre nom à mon premier enfant, je vous le promets ! Et même à tous mes enfants ! »

languages.text: “真的吗？真是太好了！愿帝皇保佑您一千年，不对，是两千年！因为您给我带来了这样的好消息！”{n}他兴高采烈地说道。{/n}“我发誓，我要用您的名字给我的第一个孩子命名！老实说，我打算给我所有的孩子都取您的名字！”
languages.original_text: "Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

traits.locale_text: “真的吗？真是太好了！愿帝皇保佑您一千年，不对，是两千年！因为您给我带来了这样的好消息！”{n}他兴高采烈地说道。{/n}“我发誓，我要用您的名字给我的第一个孩子命名！老实说，我打算给我所有的孩子都取您的名字！”

languages.text: 「ホントですか？奇跡だ！こんな良い知らせがあるなんて、どうか皇帝の加護が千年先、そしてさらにその千年先も続きますように！」{n}青年は朗々と笑う。{/n}「第一子が生まれたら、必ず陛下の名をとって名付けます！いや、むしろ子ども全員陛下にちなんだ名をつけます！」
languages.original_text: "Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

traits.locale_text: 「ホントですか？奇跡だ！こんな良い知らせがあるなんて、どうか皇帝の加護が千年先、また千年先も閣下にありますよう！」{n}青年は朗々と笑う。{/n}「第一子が生まれたら、必ず閣下の名をとって名付けます！いや、むしろ子ども全員閣下にちなんだ名をつけます！」

languages.text: «¿En serio? ¡Maravilloso! Que el Emperador te proteja mil años y mil más por traerme tan buenas noticias». {n}Está eufórico.{/n} «¡Le pondré su nombre a mi primogénito, lo juro! ¡De hecho, pondré su nombre a todos mis hijos!».
languages.original_text: "Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

traits.locale_text: «¿En serio? ¡Maravilloso! Que el Emperador te proteja mil años y mil más por traerme tan buenas noticias». {n}Está eufórico.{/n} «¡Le pondré su nombre a mi primogénito, lo juro! ¡De hecho, pondré su nombre a todos mis hijos!».

languages.text: "Gerçekten mi? Harika! Bana böylesi güzel haberler getirdiğiniz için İmparator sizi bin üstüne bin sene korusun!" {n}Gözleri sevinçle parlıyor.{/n} "İlk çocuğuma sizin adınızı vereceğim, yemin olsun! Hatta tüm çocuklarıma adınızı vereceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Really? That's marvellous! May the Emperor protect you for a thousand years and then a thousand more for bringing me such good news!" {n}He beams in elation.{/n} "I'll name my firstborn after you, I swear! In fact, I'll name all my children after you!"

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten mi? Harika! Bana böylesi güzel haberler getirdiğiniz için İmparator sizi bin üstüne bin sene korusun!" {n}Gözleri sevinçle parlıyor.{/n} "İlk çocuğuma sizin adınızı vereceğim, yemin olsun! Hatta tüm çocuklarıma adınızı vereceğim!"
